pr_title: Uid not found in folder with space

timeline.message:
Uid not found in folder with space

Also sets the executable flag when downloading the uid executable.
Fixes #1624

timeline.bodyText: there should already exist some java code doing that when the uid executable is called
timeline.author: Geosearchef

replies.bodyText: Well that code does not work then
replies.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText:
there should already exist some java code doing that when the uid executable is called

Does not seem to be the case, see https://github.com/FAForever/downlords-faf-client/blob/develop/src/main/java/com/faforever/client/legacy/PosixUidService.java
Would be weird to do this every time that exe is called.
replies.author: Slothologist
